test_selection_by_expression()[source]¶

Tests the expression-based search using the lexer/parser. Note that this functionality is optional, so only run the test if ply is available.

test_selection_by_mask()[source]¶

Test mask-based Mappable selection. Only one peak in the test dataset (in study5) should be within the sgACC.

Test peak-based Mappable selection.

test_unmask()[source]¶

Test unmasking on 1d and 2d vectors (going back to 3d and 4d)

TODO: test directly on Masker class and its functions, and on some smaller example data. But then it should get into a separate TestCase to not ‘reload’ the same Dataset. So for now let’s just reuse loaded Dataset and provide rudimentary testing
